Text: It's over.
O-Ohh...so powerful...

What's this? You can still breathe? Well, I did go
easy on ya.

If I killed all of you, I'd have a hard time finding
where you store all that golden fruit.

If you tell me where it is, I'll spare your life. So.
Where's that golden fruit?
F-Fine... I'll take you there.
Oh, so it really is golden fruit. That's pretty cool.
This village is finished...

Yeah, I'm gonna take all the golden fruit and burn
down the orchards, too.

This fruit is mine now. Try becoming a village with
some legal form of commerce, okay?

The kids you left behind...they'll all curse you for
killing their parents.

Yeah, they probably will. I'll bet the kids never
knew their parents were serial killers.

But I don't care if they curse me. It's more fun that
way.
You think revenge...is fun?

Well, then. Next on the itinerary...I'd like to learn
more about how this golden fruit works. Like, how
long it takes to kill you or what the lethal dose is.
I don't know that...

That checks out, you look like an underling. Well, I
had pretty low expectations going into this anyway.

With this kind of data, it's faster to just run
experiments yourself. And I just so happen to have
a test subject in mind.
Welcome...

Hey there, Bartender. Are your regulars coming again
tonight? You know, like that guy who keeps hyping up
the golden fruit...

The bartender pointed with his chin at a table in the
corner. His forehead was dripping with sweat.

Thanks. You should choose your regulars more wisely.
If you wanna stay in business, that is... 'Kay?

The water around here is quite pure, so the wine and
produce are delicious. We also have golden fruit, of
course.
Ooh, golden fruit? What a tall tale indeed.

Oh, no, it really is golden. If you eat it, you
become rich. If you travel here, it's something you
have to eat at least once.

I see, what an intriguing tale. However, I have no
intention of eating such a thing. One only needs but
a little wealth to travel.

However...it does sound like this fruit would make
an interesting subject for a poem. I would be
interested in seeing it or hearing about it.

Please, I insist. You won't regret it. Let me just
tell you a little more aboutâ€”
Excuse me, is this seat taken?
Hm? Um, no, you can join us...

Well, you two just seemed to be having a really
interesting conversation. I'd love to try this golden
fruit.

O-Oh, would you really? Well, I'm very pleased about
that.

Say, Mister Bard, could I request a tune? I can pay
you later...
Certainly, Miss. I'll just go up on the stage...

The wandering minstrel took his instrument to the
stage and began to strum.
Now. About this golden fruit...where could I find it?
O-Oh, right... It's in this village! See, on the map.

Ooh, cool. Thanks for the map. Gee, I'd really love
to thank you...
Ooh, I know! Sit tight. I'll buy you a drink.

Hehe, aw, I appreciate that. My throat is dry from
all that talking.

Zeta disappeared behind the counter and returned with
a filled stein.

Here you go. I had the bartender whip up a special
juice for you. I'd love for you to taste it.

Huh, it's non-alcoholic? Well, I guess I don't need
to get any more drunk...thanks.

*gulp, gulp*... Pffah! Ooh, I feel like I've come
back to life!

Haha! Funny you said that. 'Cause you're not gonna
have a life much longer.
Huh?

You lure travelers to that village...take a share of
the profits... You're the perfect plant.
You...you didn'tâ€”

But you did your job a little too well. Especially
making this mapâ€”you're just too well-prepared.
How did...you knowâ€”oof!

Aha...so it's already working. So, the golden fruit's
poison takes effect...instantaneously...
No...helpâ€”

You tricked countless ignorant travelers to their
deaths. That's karma, honey.

Oh dear, did you get drunk? There, there, let's get
you outside and sober you up.
There... I guess nature'll take care of the rest.

It's effect is instant...and it paralyzes the body...
Since your mouth can't move, you can't scream for
help. Can't breathe either.

I see...this is quite the gem... It's a perfect
poison for my line of work.

A little fruit juice is all it takes. I could even
put some on my knife...

This'll make a great souvenir for the other Seven
Shadows back home. Okay...guess it's time to head on.
I wonder what sort of fun awaits me? Hee hee.
